items.summary: Update the New Mission creation UI (MissionEditorDialog) so that on mobile-sized viewports the full mission creation form is immediately usable without scrollingâ€”specifically, the Mission title input, the Add task input + add button, and the primary actions (Cancel / Create Mission) must all be visible at once when the dialog opens.

Limit changes strictly to the Mission creation form UI implementation (MissionEditorDialog) and any directly-required Mission UI wiring; do not modify other app areas, flows, or startup/login behavior.
